text:
Mhd/Pacificcoastnews

Susan Sarandon and Seal were spotted heading to the swanky Matsuhisa restaurant in Beverly Hills for a late-night dinner date. Sarandon, 70, most recently split with her former boyfriend Jonathan Bricklin in 2015 and Seal, 54, was linked to singer Erica Packer, though multiple reports said they split in late 2016. No word from either of the celebs on whether a relationship is blossoming or if it was just a friendly dinner, but both seemed caught off guard by the paparazzi as they left together on Aug. 9, 2017.
title: Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson spark romance rumors with dinner date

meta_data.description: Coldplay singer Chris Martin was spotted on a sushi dinner date in Los Angeles with "Fifty Shades of Grey" actress Dakota Johnson.
